name: Rocket drift (itch)
description:
After detecting an anomally that atracts planets´ mass(And with them people) mr.capitan embarked into his journey to save the lucky ones on masses orbiting the anomally and end it 

will he succed?will he survive?only time will say.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

controls:

space:accelerate the ship.

left shift/control:increase/decrease the engine´s throtle.

left arrow/A: add torque to the ship to the left.

right arrow/D:add torque to the ship to the right.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

made for the 2# blackthornprod game jam

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

install and play instructions:

1:download it

2:extract files from the .rar 

3:open the "Rocket drift" folder

4:click the executable

5:play it
